title: The Final Countdown (Kirk Douglas, Martin Sheen)
description: The USS Nimitz is crusing 200 miles off Pearl Harbour when a storm approaches them unexpectedly and a unearthly green light envelops them and they are transported into the war between America and Japan in 1941.  How did they get there, what was that strange green light and will they ever get home.  Whilst there, they find themselves torn between helping the US in the war or  leaving events to play out as they had in their own time.  [b]Kirk Douglas, Martin Sheen, Katherine Ross and James Farentino[/b] star in this old fashioned, mysterious, war time and romantic movie.
